mapper.select: /* MGZ9 리스트 */ SELECT MGZ_SQ as mgzSq ,MBR_SQ as mbrSq ,MGZ_TITLE as mgzTitle ,MGZ_DESCRPTN as mgzDescrptn ,MGZ_MAIN_IMG_URL as mgzMainImgUrl ,MGZ_TYP_CD as mgzTypCd ,REG_MBR_SQ as regMbrSq ,REG_DT as regDt ,DATE_FORMAT(REG_DT, '%Y.%m.%d') as regDate ,UPDT_MBR_SQ as updtMbrSq ,UPDT_DT as updtDt ,DEL_YN as delYn ,USE_YN as useYn FROM TBL_DA_MGZ_M WHERE (USE_YN = 'Y' AND DEL_YN = 'N') AND MGZ_TYP_CD = #{mgzTypCd}

/* MGZ9 리스트 */ SELECT MGZ_SQ as mgzSq ,MBR_SQ as mbrSq ,MGZ_TITLE as mgzTitle ,MGZ_DESCRPTN as mgzDescrptn ,MGZ_CONTENT as mgzContent ,MGZ_MAIN_IMG_URL as mgzMainImgUrl ,MGZ_TYP_CD as mgzTypCd ,REG_MBR_SQ as regMbrSq ,REG_DT as regDt ,UPDT_MBR_SQ as updtMbrSq ,UPDT_DT as updtDt ,DEL_YN as delYn ,USE_YN as useYn FROM TBL_DA_MGZ_M WHERE (USE_YN = 'Y' AND DEL_YN = 'N') AND MGZ_SQ = #{mgzSq}
